description: This is a Dart source file defining a custom Flutter theme called 'OceanTheme'. It provides a method to build a ThemeData object with specific color schemes, typography, and component styles, tailored to a minimalist aesthetic with specific color tokens.

classes.name: _OceanExtraColors
classes.description: A ThemeExtension to expose custom colors (like success) within the theme, making it accessible via Theme.of(context).extension<_OceanExtraColors>()

methods.name: buildOceanTheme
methods.description: Constructs a ThemeData object with ocean-inspired color palette, typography, and component styles, allowing theming of a Flutter app with minimalist, clean design.
